General.Name: Shenzhen Highpower Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shenzhen Highpower Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, manufacture, and sale of lithium-ion and nickel-metal hydride batteries in China. The company offers lithium and nickel-metal hydride batteries, battery solutions, and energy storage systems, as well as battery recycling and re-utilization services. Its products are used in smart wearable devices, bluetooth speakers, personal care and backup power products, tablet PCs/laptops, smartphones, handheld devices, smart security equipment, consumer market and wireless communication products, lighting products, smart medical devices, robotic cleaners, garden tools, energy storage systems, and LEVs. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Highpower Technology Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Highpower Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen Highpower Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hong Kong Highpower Technology Company Limited.
